title: Persevere
creator_credit: John Vincent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Soon after landing in South Vietnam, John Vincent was sent to Pleiku to serve as a Platoon Commander. In telling of his time in Pleiku, John considers the cultural assumptions he made and the importance of his training in military action.
creator_credit_for_label: John Vincent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
